headline: RBC starts Air Products, Linde at Outperform on earnings recovery
summary: Investing.com -- RBC Capital Markets began coverage of Air Products and Chemicals (NYSE:APD) and Linde (NYSE:LIN) with Outperform ratings, saying both industrial gas companies are well positioned to deliver steady earnings growth and improved returns.Air Products was described as a turnaround story. RBC said a recent pullback in shares presents a buying opportunity. With new leadership moving the company away from riskier growth projects and refocusing on its traditional industrial gas operation

headline: Air Products to Showcase Industrial Gas Solutions at the PowderMet2025 International Conference on Powder Metallurgy and Particulate Materials
summary: Air Products (NYSE:APD) will showcase industrial gas solutions and technologies for metals and materials processing applications at the PowderMet2025 International Conference on Powder Metallurgy and Particulate Materials from June 15-18 at the Sheraton Phoenix Downtown in Phoenix, Arizona.

headline: Saudi Arabia’s Giant Hydrogen Project Reaches 80% Completion
summary: Saudi Arabia’s NEOM Green Hydrogen Project is 80% complete, on track to start green ammonia exports by 2027.
